info.name: FoodMission Shopping List Item API
info.description:
Collection for FoodMission Shopping List Item API endpoints.

**IMPORTANT:** Make sure the `base_url` variable is set to `http://localhost:3000` (or your backend server URL) in your Postman environment. Do NOT use a frontend URL (like localhost:5173 or localhost:4200).

The API uses the global prefix `/api/v1`, so all endpoints are under `/api/v1/...`

**Note:** When checking an item (checked=true) using the `toggle-checked` endpoint, it will create a pantry item if the user's `shouldAutoAddToPantry` preference is enabled.

request.description:
Creates a new Shopping List Item and adds it to the specified shopping list. The shoppingListId must belong to the authenticated user. Requires user or admin role.

**Rate Limit:** 10 requests per minute

**Required fields:**
- `shoppingListId` (UUID): The ID of the shopping list to add the item to
- `foodId` (UUID): The ID of the food item to add
- `quantity` (number, min 1): The quantity of the item
- `unit` (enum): The unit of measurement (PIECES, G, KG, ML, L, CUPS). Defaults to PIECES if not provided.
- `checked` (boolean): Whether the item is checked off. Defaults to false.

**Optional fields:**
- `notes` (string, max 500 chars): Additional notes for the item

exec: // Set default food_id if not exists
// Warn if shopping_list_id is not set
console.warn('Warning: shopping_list_id is not set. Please set it manually or create a shopping list first.');

request.description:
Toggle the checked status of a shopping list item. When checking an item (willBeChecked = true), creates a pantry item from the shopping list item if the user's `shouldAutoAddToPantry` preference is enabled. Requires user or admin role.

**Behavior:**
- If item is unchecked (checked=false) and you toggle it: item becomes checked (checked=true) and a pantry item is created (if user preference allows)
- If item is checked (checked=true) and you toggle it: item becomes unchecked (checked=false) and no pantry item is created
Retrieve shopping list items with optional filtering. This is a public endpoint.
